info.title: JoinData Message definitions
info.description: The specification describes the JoinData Datahub Broker API.

tags.name: ICAR inspired
tags.description: Messages which do not exist in current ICAR-ADE standard, but which follow the same principles

tags.name: Local/other standard
tags.description: Messages which are (soon) available through JoinData, but without any affiliation to ICAR

get.summary: Get the data for milking visits
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from visits of animals to a milking parlour

parameters.name: location-scheme
parameters.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

parameters.name: start-date-time
parameters.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

parameters.name: end-date-time
parameters.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

201.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

default.description: An error has occured while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

get.summary: Get the quarter milking data for a specific milking visit
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides quarter milking data from a singular visit of an animal to a milking parlour

parameters.name: location-scheme
parameters.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

201.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

default.description: An error has occured while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

get.summary: Get the animals on a location.
get.description:
_Based upon ICAR ADE GetHerdListRequest._
# Purpose
Returns the herd list for a location.

parameters.name: location-scheme
parameters.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

parameters.name: start-date-time
parameters.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

parameters.name: end-date-time
parameters.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the animal identifiers for the location.

default.description: An error has occurred while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

get.summary: Get the core details of the animals on a location.
get.description:
_Based upon ICAR ADE GetHerdListRequest._
# Purpose
Returns a herd list for a location containing core animal data.

parameters.name: location-scheme
parameters.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

parameters.name: start-date-time
parameters.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

parameters.name: end-date-time
parameters.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the animal core data set for the location.

default.description: An error has occurred while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

get.summary: Get the dairy grazing summary data
get.description:
# Purpose
Returns a summary with information about the grazing pattern of the animals on the given location.

parameters.name: location-scheme
parameters.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

parameters.name: start-date-time
parameters.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

parameters.name: end-date-time
parameters.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

parameters.name: modified-since
parameters.description: The date-time of insertion or last update of the event.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the dairy grazing summary data for the location.

default.description: An error has occurred while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

get.summary: Get health activity information for animals on a location.
get.description:
# Purpose
Returns a list with health activity information for a location.

parameters.name: location-scheme
parameters.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

parameters.name: start-date-time
parameters.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

parameters.name: end-date-time
parameters.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

parameters.name: animal-scheme
parameters.description: The scheme id for the animal identifier. Should be used together with animal-id.

parameters.name: animal-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the animal. Should be used together with animal-scheme.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the health activity data for the location.

default.description: An error has occurred while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

post.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from a singular animal registration

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

requestBody.description: The animal you want to register

201.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

default.description: An error has occurred while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

get.summary: Get the identification tags on a location.
get.description:
# Purpose
Returns the identification tags for a location. Examples are Nedap, SCR and Gallagher identification tags (EIDs) for animals.

parameters.name: location-scheme
parameters.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the current identification tags available on the location.

default.description: An error has occurred while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

get.summary: Get the bio-diversity reports for the location in the given period.

parameters.name: location-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

parameters.name: end-date-time
parameters.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

200.description: Successful. The response contains a list of all generated biodiversity reports for the location.

default.description: An error has occurred while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

heatBehavior.description: The behavior of the cow as it relates to it being in heat.

dailyRumination.description: The number of minutes a cow ruminates during the day (24-hour period)

dailyEating.description: The number of minutes a cow eats during the day (24 hour period)

activityTrend.description: The trend of the cows activity. This is usually higher when the cow is approaching the time it is in heat.

icarHeatActivityScrSenseTime.description: Contains SenseTime specific fields. Only one element can be present per item.

icarHeatActivityVendorSpecific.description: Contains vendor specific fields. Only one vendor element can be present.

icarHealthReportVendorSpecific.description: Contains vendor specific fields. Only one vendor element can be present.

icarHealthReportNedapBusinessInsight.description: Specific fields for Nedap Business Insight. TO BE IMPLEMENTED

icarHeatReportVendorSpecific.description: Contains vendor specific fields. Only one vendor element can be present.

icarHeatReportNedapBusinessInsight.description: Specific fields for Nedap Business Insight. TO BE IMPLEMENTED

dailyRumination.description: The number of minutes a cow ruminates during the day (24-hour period)

dailyEating.description: The number of minutes a cow eats during the day (24 hour period)

hourlyRumination.description: The number of minutes a cow ruminates during an hour.

hourlyEating.description: The number of minutes a cow eats an hour.

activityTrend.description: The trend of the cows activity. Cows when they are not well are less active.

icarHealthActivityScrSenseTime.description: Contains SenseTime specific fields. Only one element can be present per item.

dataSource.description: Source where data is retrieved from. Details can be retrieved from the source register.

id.description: A unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem

status.description: The HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value

code.description: An application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem that SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. Like title, this fields value can be localized.

error.description: A human-readable error message describing what went wrong.
An error has occurred while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

schema.description: A default response containing only a list of errors

queryEndDateTime.name: end-date-time
queryEndDateTime.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

pathLocationScheme.name: location-scheme
pathLocationScheme.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

queryEndDateTimeRequired.name: end-date-time
queryEndDateTimeRequired.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

queryModifiedSince.name: modified-since
queryModifiedSince.description: The date-time of insertion or last update of the event.

pathLocationId.name: location-id
pathLocationId.description: The unique identifier for the location.

pathMilkDeliveryId.name: milk-delivery-id
pathMilkDeliveryId.description: The unique identifier for a milk delivery for a specific location.

queryAnimalScheme.name: animal-scheme
queryAnimalScheme.description: The scheme id for the animal identifier. Should be used together with animal-id.

queryStartDateTimeRequired.name: start-date-time
queryStartDateTimeRequired.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

pathMilkInvoiceId.name: milk-invoice-id
pathMilkInvoiceId.description: The unique identifier for a milk invoice for a specific location.

queryAnimalId.name: animal-id
queryAnimalId.description: The unique identifier for the animal. Should be used together with animal-scheme.

queryStartDateTime.name: start-date-time
queryStartDateTime.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

jdClient.description: Secure access using client credentials grant

scopes.fullaccess: Full access to all resources when mandate is available

scopes.fullaccess: Full access to all resources when mandate is available
